summary: This is a prisoner production order from the U.S. Marshal Service for the Southern District of New York, dated July 17, 2019, for the production of a prisoner on July 18, 2019. The document is an administrative directive for transporting a prisoner, likely Jeffrey Epstein, given the date and context of the case.

persons.name: Deputy United States Marshal
persons.role: Law enforcement officer issuing the order
persons.context: The sender of the prisoner production order from the U.S. Marshal Service for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Prisoner Production Order
events.description: A prisoner is ordered to be produced, likely for a court appearance or transfer, as per the directive from the U.S. Marshal Service.

keyFacts: A prisoner production order was issued on July 17, 2019, for execution on July 18, 2019.
The order originated from the U.S. Marshal Service for the Southern District of New York.
The document is administrative, focusing on the logistics of prisoner transport.
The timing (July 2019) coincides with Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and court proceedings prior to his death in August 2019.
